notesStmt.note: A reply to John Jewel's "A defence of the Apologie of the Churche of Englande" (STC 14600). Answered in Jewel's 1570 expansion of that work (STC 14601).
At foot of title page: Cum privilegio.
Includes at end "a table of M. Iewels notorious lies" and an index.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
